title: Aru Machi Kado no Monogatari (Tales of the Street Corner)
synopsis: On a certain street corner, there live a girl and her bear doll; a mischievous mouse named Kanku-bouya; a sycamore tree; an old street lamp; a moth; and posters containing a bar girl, a violinist, and a pianist. They all strive for life, but the world may not allow them to flourish.
staff: [['Yamamoto, Eiichi', ['Episode Director', ' Key Animation', ' Editing']], ['Tezuka, Osamu', ['Original Creator']], ['Rintaro', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Sugii, Gisaburou', ['Key Animation']]]
